snippet: The family of Amir Hekmati, the former Marine imprisoned in Iran, released a letter from his ailing father’s doctor asking Iran to free Mr. Hekmati.
abstract: Doctor for Ali Hekmati, terminally ill father of imprisoned former Marine Amir Hekmati, has written to Iranian judicial authorities asking them to release Hekmati on compassionate grounds so that he may return home to see his family.

byline.contributor: Thomas Erdbrink contributed reporting from Tehran.

lead_paragraph: The family of Amir Hekmati, the former Marine imprisoned in Iran, released a letter from his ailing father’s doctor asking Iran to free Mr. Hekmati.
